storyInfo: Tippi questions Michael, who was the last to see Shelly alive, and suspects him of being the killer. A camera assistant inquires about Lucian's secrets, only to learn that a Catastrophe is about to hit the studio plate.

attributes.content: ...Shelly is dead.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: First Dalton, now Shelly... What's going on here?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: I said, Shelly is dead.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: What's with that tone?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Anyway, thanks for coming to inform us that another accident occurred. We're shocked too.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: The last person she met before she died was Michael.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Don't make baseless accusations, Tip.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: She was watching movies with you and Moira. I heard all about it.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Exactly. She was with us, but left partway through after she got a message. Molly and I didn't ask, and we didn't go with her. But maybe we should have...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Which is why we need to find out exactly what happened. So I asked around, and—
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Someone saw her with you at the studio near the warehouse!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I just bumped into her!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: She looked distracted. I thought she must've been feeling guilty about interrupting the shoot, so I offered to comfort her.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: How was I supposed to know she would take her own life?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Comfort her? In an empty studio? Just the two of you?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Come on, babe, you know you're the only girl for me.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Just shut up already!
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: So did you really kill Shelly?
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: Two accidents in as many days?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: And not just accidents, fatalities. Of all the film crews in Wrankwood, how'd I end up in this one? Just my rotten luck...
attributes.name: Unlucky Stagehand

attributes.content: Oh, come on. You blame your luck whenever a can of paint gets spilled, whenever a shadow dashes across the studio door, even when the intercity net has a bad signal.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Well, I say this is our big break! Do you even realize how much the tabloids will pay for a firsthand account from a witness?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go make sure I remember every last detail of Shelly's corpse.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Ugh, could you not? And we still have work to do on set.
attributes.name: Unlucky Stagehand

attributes.content: You go first, Hautin. I have notes to take!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Abner said Shelly's been out of sorts for a while now. Did the shock of Dalton's death drive her to suicide?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Sounds plausible, but it's not much of a story.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: If there's more to it than meets the eye... then I wouldn't have to worry about rent for half a year. Why should I be holding up mics just to make ends meet?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Didn't the medical team say she died of hypothermia? Then what's with all these wounds on her left palm?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Yikes, that's creepy. Is it some kind of occult ritual?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Not a ritual, but the sign of a struggle against herself.
...Struggle?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Isn't everyone saying she walked into the cold storage from stress? Could there really be a dark secret to this...?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Whoa, Lucian! Where'd you come from? I didn't hear you at all!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I suggested that she fight her hallucinations with pain.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She had been hearing echoes of the past, but wanted to finish her work and bring this movie to a satisfactory conclusion.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She wouldn't have taken her own life out of despair. The self-inflicted wounds on her hand are proof of that.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: This time, however, the pain was not enough for her to escape.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: That stubborn, neurotic, and paranoid Shelly actually listened to you? Now that's hard to believe...
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: But it sounds like you knew her well, Lucian.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Not especially.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Are you kidding me?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I killed Shelly just because she rejected me? Babe, do you even hear what you're saying?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Tip, you said she left because she got a message, right?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: I noticed her holding her terminal too. So whoever sent that message must've killed her, right?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: And you're saying it wasn't you?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I'd also like an explanation, Michael.
attributes.name: Marion

attributes.content: The terminal was damaged by the cold, making it impossible to retrieve the logs, but everyone on the film crew was given the same company-issued model. There shouldn't be anyone but crew members on the contact list...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: And what's that supposed to prove, Detective?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: It could just as well be Greta, or Melanie.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: They sure weren't happy with how she interrupted the shooting that day. Maybe one of them decided to give her a piece of her mind.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Shelly and Greta are glued at the hip when working, giving them plenty of opportunities to deal with anything unexpected.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: And Melanie is a stickler for the rules and etiquette of the industry. She always respects the crew's schedule and would never disturb a coworker when they're off the clock.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: The only clue we have is that she was with you right before she died.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Look, I don't know who sent her that message either, okay? I just ran into her at the studio!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: At that hour, wouldn't you normally be drinking with the girls from the art team, or in Marion's room?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Aren't you usually busiest at night?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: So why did you go back to the filming area, Michael?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Oh, my lovely little birdie, are you jealous that you haven't had the chance to drink with me yet?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Well, you'll have plenty of chances once you grow up—
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: So you came to the studio for whatever unknown reason, where you ran into Shelly, who had left the prop room to meet someone else. If all you did was offer a few words of comfort, why won't you give me a straight answer?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Did you really have nothing to do with her death?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: What, after working every stupid little oddjob in Wrankwood, from cleaner to stagehand to set decorator to background painter, now you're playing at being a detective?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Or did Shelly become an honorary member of your little sisterhood with Moira after watching a single horror flick together?
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: Give me a break.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: How many times has she yelled at you for those scribbles you call work? You're hardly friends. I don't see why you're coming after me now.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: And you think there's a culprit behind every accident? Maybe all those movies have rotted your brain!
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: ...In the two months I've known Shelly, she's almost never smiled or praised anyone's work.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Sure, I got more criticism than anyone. I've had to put in a ton of overtime to make a background we were both happy with.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: But I've also seen the joy on her face when she was checking the film at the end of each day. And she could catch all the obscure movie references I snuck into my backgrounds.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: If... she was in so much pain that freeing herself of it like this seemed like the best option, then I'll just have to accept that.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: But if someone else was messing with her feelings, and taking away her chance to enjoy the movies she loved so much... then I'll never forgive them!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I really did run into Shelly by chance. I went to the studio to... see someone.
attributes.name: Michael

attributes.content: See someone? Can anyone corroborate that?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: It was me.
Molly?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Michael came to see me last night.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Were you close to her?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I simply empathized with her pain.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She needed to stay lucid. So did I.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: (Mutters) Hm, a mysterious curse, or a love turned to hate... Which would sell better?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Ahem. So, where were you last night?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: The second-floor office.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: That's where Shelly and Greta keep their important documents. What were you doing there?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Solving a puzzle.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Anyone see you there?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Miss.Christine.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Hah, I'm supposed to take the word of that creature who's always following you around? She doesn't even talk!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Come on, don't look so pissed.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I saw you perform opposite Dalton the other day. I know how good an actor you are. You could tell me anything and it'd sound believable.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: But to tell you the truth, I don't even care how Shelly died. And I wouldn't tell the police even if you were involved.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Heck, getting your name in the tabloids might even make the cops less suspicious. Tons of people read them, but no one believes a word they say.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: So, how about you cooperate a little—what's this puzzle you were solving in the office? Trying to set a trap for Shelly?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: You're not worried that a murder occurred on the plate?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Hey, this film crew's got no shortage of grudges and scores to settle... And how else am I supposed to make a living? You think there's any money in being a camera assistant?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Even if the answer might threaten everyone's lives?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Hah! You sure can talk big.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Then I must ask you to keep this a secret...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Of course! The tabloids will pay good money for it, so why would I give away my own golden ticket?
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Lucian leans towards the camera assistant and whispers the hidden truth in his ear.
The look in the assistant's eyes turns from excitement to terror.
What?!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: The Forte's scream echoes through the warehouse. His notebook and pen fall to the ground.
The other staff, still cleaning up the scene, look at the two of them disapprovingly. But only for a moment, until the terrifying message reaches their ears.
A Catastrophe is about to hit the plate?!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant
